short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With Humancredit you can liberate your screen from annoying ads and create donation value with ad‑interactions.

long.ar,bg,ca,cs,da,el,es,et,fa,fi,fil,fr,he,:
Digital self‑determination

Humancredit promotes a better user experience by replacing annoying push ads by user‑driven pull communication. It’s up to our users to decide which ads they wish to receive, what information they want to share and how much they would like to engage with brands.
long.am,bn,de,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,gu,:
The fair Ad-Filter

Humancredit promotes a better user experience by accepting only ads from ethically engaged brands that reward your ad-engagement by funding good causes of your choice. Take control, which ads may reach you, which information you want to share and contribute to a better world. (Based on uBlock₀.)
